thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhuzhou Hongda Electronics sees FY 2017 net profit to up as much as 10 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhuzhou Hongda Electronics sees FY 2017 net profit to up as much as 10 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - zhuzhou hongda electronics co ltd

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Zhuzhou Hongda Electronics Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by up to 10 percent, or to be as much as 215.9 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 196.3 million yuan
* Says steady growth of main business as main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/XtQ6p4
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
